tool.name: Deconatminate Clones
tool.description: Search for sequences belonging to the 3 standard monoclonal contaminants and remove them from the files.

param.name: clone_inputs
param.label: MiXCR Clone Files
param.help: Tab-separated file produced by MiXCR. Contains counts, fractions, and identifying information about each clonotype.

tool.help: This tool removes monoclonal contamination from the clone files produced by MiXCR, prior to normalization.
